amendment.description: To include additional members and additional duties for the independent panel assessing the 2009 quadrennial defense review.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1806 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8015) To include additional members and additional duties for the independent panel assessing the 2009 quadrennial defense review.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1806 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Thune.
